wikipedia_page.main: Katharine Anne Pearce (born 16 February 1963) is a Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler.

Kelly represented Wales at the 2014 Commonwealth Games and only just missed out on a bronze medal losing out to South Africa in the bronze medal play off in the Women's triples with Kathy Pearce and Lisa Forey.

In 2008 she finished runner-up to Kathy Pearce in the World Singles Champion of Champions held in Aberdeen. Malloy has also represented Scotland at two Commonwealth Games, when she participated in the triples event at the 2010 Commonwealth Games and both the pairs and fours at the 2014 Commonwealth Games.
